plot: Adam is a hardworking man but is pushed to his limits with his failed attempts of finding the love of his life. But his limits only go so far as he fatally misses another opportunity with his co-worker, Eve.
title: Absurdity
plot_es: Adam is a hardworking man but is pushed to his limits with his failed attempts of finding the love of his life. But his limits only go so far as he fatally misses another opportunity with his co-worker, Eve.
plot_en: Adam is a hardworking man but is pushed to his limits with his failed attempts of finding the love of his life. But his limits only go so far as he fatally misses another opportunity with his co-worker, Eve.
